level.heading: Definitions.
level.text: For the purposes of this part, the term:
"Executive Director" means the Executive Director of the Office of First Source Compliance.
"Office" means the Office of First Source Compliance.
"First Source Employment Agreement" means the requirements of part A of this subchapter [ยง 2-219.01 et seq.].

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 17-219
level.text: For Law 17-219, see notes following ยง 2-219.31.
